newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Woodroffe says take no action on bid.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Woodroffe says take no action on bid.

text.p: Independent directors of metal products maker Woodroffe Industries Ltd on Monday advised shareholders to take no action on a takeover offer by Hills Industries Ltd, pending further information.

In a statement, Woodroffe said its board had formed a subcommittee of independent directors to consider the offer and to engage an independent expert to provide a report for shareholders, as required by the Corporations Law.
Hills, which currently owns 49.82 percent of the ordinary issued shares of Woodroffe, has offered 75 cents a share for the remaining shares in the company.
The offer is conditional on Hills becoming entitled to 90 percent of Woodroffe's ordinary shares and receiving acceptances from 75 percent of the remaining shareholders.

Woodroffe said shareholders would receive a formal offer and a Part A disclosure statement from Hills in due course, as well as a Part B statement response from Woodroffe, with the independent experts' report.
Woodroffe shares were six cents higher at 80 cents on Monday.
